name: Intro
_source: # This is where the dialogue itself starts
speak;Reimu;Shoot, did we pass by that stump before?
speak;Marisa;This is the third time already. I'm starting to think you're more forgetful than that night sparrow.
speak;Reimu;Well, at least I'm trying to figure out where we're going. {c:wait;100}{tgm}*sigh* {c:wait;400}{tgm}This would be so much easier if we could you know, fly.
speak;Marisa;Where's that lucky rabbit when you need her?
speak;Marisa;{tgm}...{tgm}Well that's no rabbit, but I'm checking it out!
speak;Reimu;Marisa, wait! We need to stick togeth- {c:wait;200}and there she goes. Always rushing in...
speak;Reimu;And not even in the right direction. What are you three doing here?
speak;Sunny;O-oh! It's Miss Reimu! Come on, you gotta help us save Cirno!;;;;2
speak;Reimu;Hold on, one at a time! Star, what exactly happened?
speak;Star;Cirno got kidnapped by those rabbit folk over there, so we were getting ready to save her.
speak;Sunny;Then this weird maid with a hammer came and hit Mystia and Wriggle, and they both went crazy!
speak;Mystia;Hey! Who are you calling crazy!
speak;Reimu;Hey, relax. I already beat the crazy out of her enough.
speak;Mystia;Wow, even the shrine maiden has a heart. Who knew?
speak;Reimu;{tgm}...{tgm}Maybe just a few more hits for safety.;;;;0.5
speak;Mystia;Ahaha... {c:wait;100}I guess I'll shut up now.
speak;Reimu;Well, we are heading up to Eientei anyway... are you sure you can fight? I wouldn't exactly call you guys dangerous.
speak;Luna;This time is different! We had a special training routine just for this moment!
speak;Reimu;That axe is twice your size - are you sure you can even lift it?
speak;Kasen;Reimu, I believe these fairies are safer with us than traveling home alone.
speak;Reimu;Kasen, what did I say about lecturing?
speak;Kasen;Not a lecture, merely an observation.
speak;Reimu;{tgm}*sigh* {c:wait;150}{tgm}Sometimes I just can't with you. Alright fine, you three are coming with us.
speak;Sunny;But Miss Reimu, aren't you worried about Marisa?
speak;Reimu;She can hold her own just fine. I'm sure we'll bump back into her any moment now...
speak;Tewi;Hehe, the fog is just right for an ambush. Those trick chests will definitely come in handy too.
speak;Ringo;With all due respect, Tewi... why are we even fighting these guys?
speak;Seiran;Ringo, how could you say that, and after Master Eirin took us in after the invasion! We are indebted to her.
speak;Ringo;I'm just saying, I didn't come down to Earth just to get conscripted again...
speak;Tewi;Pipe down you two, you'll blow our cover! We gotta cover for Eirin so she can finish that weird project of hers.
speak;Tewi;I called it weird for a reason. I have no idea what that lady is up to half the time anyway.
speak;Seiran;You shouldn't speak so casually about Master Eirin... Isn't she your superior?
speak;Tewi;Is that some kind of moon rabbit thing? This whole "rank" thing makes no sense. Anyways, here they come. Get into position, I'm heading off to prepare some... surprises.
speak;Seiran;What kind of rabbit doesn't understand ranks...?;;;;0.5
speak;Ringo;Geez. She has no faith in us, does she? Whatever.
speak;;This map's clear bonus is 300 Bonus EXP, with a decrease of 15 BExp per turn you take over 15 turns!;;;hint
